about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My passion is to help people reach their maximum potential through fitness and personalized nutrition.
about.intro: Hello! I'm Sabina Meruță, the founder of SMfit and an internationally certified personal trainer, with over 2 years of experience in fitness and nutrition.
about.paragraph1: My passion for movement and art took shape during adolescence, when I obtained my Professional Choreographer and Dancer diploma, and later discovered the transformative effects of gym workouts. I was amazed at how regular exercise, combined with proper nutrition, can revitalize the body and significantly increase energy levels.
about.paragraph2: Currently, I am a student at the Faculty of Pharmacy - Nutrition and Dietetics specialization, at the University of Medicine, Pharmacy, Sciences and Technology "George Emil Palade" in Târgu Mureș, and I hold numerous internationally accredited courses in fitness and healthy eating.
about.paragraph3: With each personalized program, I combine practical experience, nutrition science, and choreographic creativity to help you achieve your goals!

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.intro: My philosophy is based on a few fundamental principles:

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.text: Each person is unique, with different needs, limitations, and goals. That's why all my programs are 100% personalized for each client.

scientific.title: Scientific Approach
scientific.text: I rely on current scientific research and proven methods, not on passing trends or "miracle solutions". Efficiency and safety are priorities.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.text: I believe in sustainable changes, not temporary solutions. My goal is to help you develop healthy long-term habits, not just achieve quick results that don't last.

education.title: Education
education.text: Beyond workouts and nutrition plans, I aim to educate you about your body and help you understand why we do certain exercises or make certain food choices.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our workouts and programs.

items.question: How often should I work out to see results?
items.answer: For most people, 3-4 workouts per week are enough to see progress. Consistency is more important than frequency. We will adapt the frequency according to your goals and schedule.

items.question: How do online workouts work?
items.answer: You will receive a personalized monthly program on WhatsApp, with demonstration videos for each exercise. You can send recordings of your executions for feedback and adjustments.

items.question: Do I need to use supplements to get results?
items.answer: It's not mandatory, most results come from consistent training and proper nutrition. However, certain supplements can help depending on your goals. We'll discuss options if you're interested, but they're not essential.

items.question: How long until I see results?
items.answer: Most clients notice changes in the first 2-4 weeks, especially in energy and strength levels. Visible body transformations usually appear after 6-8 weeks of consistency in training and nutrition.

items.question: Does the nutrition plan include recipes?
items.answer: Yes, the nutrition plan includes meal examples, simple recipes, and lists of alternatives for ingredients, so you can adapt the plan to your culinary preferences and the time available for meal preparation.
